abstract: The leader of Goldman’s Chicago office, Byron D. Trott, plans to invest in and advise family-owned businesses.
snippet: The leader of Goldman’s Chicago office, Byron D. Trott, plans to invest in and advise family-owned businesses.
lead_paragraph: The Goldman Sachs banker who has the ear of Warren E. Buffett is leaving to set up his own investment and advisory firm, a person briefed on the matter said Monday.

headline.main: Banker Is Said to Leave Goldman for His Own Firm
headline.print_headline: Banker Is Said to Leave Goldman for His Own Firm
